hero.title: Proactive Health Monitoring for rakshak Conditions
hero.subtitle: Millions fail to track their health regularly, leading to unseen risks. rakshak AI, your autonomous health agent, detects dangerous trends early and alerts your doctor before complications arise.
hero.card3Desc: Of risks before they become critical.

features.title: Why rakshak AI Works
features.subtitle: From continuous tracking to intelligent alerts, rakshak AI provides a complete ecosystem for proactive health management.
features.f1Desc: Collects readings (BP, sugar, steps, sleep) from devices or manual logs to keep everyone aware of real-time health.
features.f2Desc: Uses AI to find patterns like “BP rising for 5 days” to detect issues early, before symptoms worsen.
features.f3Desc: Suggests simple, personalized actions like “Reduce salt today” or “Walk 20 mins after lunch” to help maintain targets.
features.f4Desc: Tracks when a patient misses doses or logs inconsistent data, detecting adherence problems early.
features.f5Desc: If risk continues, automatically compiles a report and sends it to the doctor for early intervention.
features.f6Desc: Learns which actions work best for each patient, improving future recommendations over time.

about.title: Closing the Gap Between Visits
about.p1: Doctors often see patients only during periodic visits, meaning dangerous trends like rising blood pressure, sugar spikes, or missed medications can go unnoticed until it's too late.
about.p2: rakshak AI bridges this gap. Our AI agent acts as a vigilant extension of the clinical team, providing a continuous feedback loop between the patient and their doctor. This ensures that care is proactive, not reactive.

howItWorks.title: A Simpler Path to Better Health
howItWorks.subtitle: In three simple steps, rakshak AI transforms raw health data into life-saving actions and insights.
howItWorks.step1Desc: Patients log vitals through connected devices or our simple app. The AI agent begins continuous, non-intrusive monitoring immediately.
howItWorks.step2Desc: The agent detects hidden trends and provides personalized, actionable feedback to the patient to help them stay on track with their health goals.
howItWorks.step3Desc: If a risk persists, a smart alert with a full data summary is sent to the doctor, enabling them to intervene early and prevent complications.

patientJourney.title: Follow a Patient's Journey
patientJourney.subtitle: See how rakshak AI turns data into decisive action with a real-world example.
patientJourney.step1Desc: Raj, a 50-year-old with Type-2 Diabetes, syncs his BP and glucose readings automatically.
patientJourney.step2Desc: The agent notices Raj's BP is trending up over 4 days, a sign of potential trouble.
patientJourney.step3Desc: rakshak AI messages Raj: 'Your BP is rising. Try reducing salt today and walk 15 minutes after lunch.'
patientJourney.step4Desc: When his BP remains high, the agent automatically alerts Raj's doctor with a concise report.
patientJourney.step5Desc: The doctor reviews the data, adjusts medication remotely, and Raj’s BP returns to normal. A complication is avoided.
